blocks.text: Use the search box to filter by risk, size, modality, or nodule type.

items: Applies to adults >=35 years with incidental nodules (not screening, known cancer, or immunosuppression).
For multiple nodules, use the most suspicious nodule to guide management.
Follow-up intervals can be adjusted based on clinical risk and imaging features.

blocks.text: Matches scenario labels, size columns, and comments.
